title: $:/plugins/tg/iframe-button
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/core/images/iframe": { "created": "20170605114929128", "text": "", "title": "$:/core/images/iframe", "modified": "20171030121310523", "tags": "$:/tags/Image" }, "$:/language/Buttons/iFrame/Caption": { "text": "Insert iframe", "title": "$:/language/Buttons/iFrame/Caption", "modified": "20170605133024327", "created": "20170605132926726" }, "$:/language/Buttons/iFrame/Hint": { "text": "Insert an iframe", "title": "$:/language/Buttons/iFrame/Hint", "modified": "20170605133054520", "created": "20170605133045795" }, "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/iframe": { "text": "{{$:/language/Buttons/iFrame/Hint}}", "title": "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/iframe", "modified": "20170605133154437", "created": "20170605133140906" }, "$:/config/shortcuts/iframe": { "created": "20170605133402913", "text": "ctrl-shift-F", "title": "$:/config/shortcuts/iframe", "modified": "20170620100526469" }, "$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/iframe": { "created": "20170605120607408", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "<$action-sendmessage\n\t$message=\"tm-edit-text-operation\"\n\t$param=\"wrap-selection\"\n\tprefix=\"\"\"<>\"\"\"\n/>", "title": "$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/iframe", "tags": "$:/tags/EditorToolbar", "modified": "20221229115621706", "icon": "$:/core/images/iframe", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/iFrame/Hint}}", "condition": "[!has[type]] [type[text/vnd.tiddlywiki]]", "caption": "{{$:/language/Buttons/iFrame/Caption}}", "shortcuts": "((iframe))", "modifier": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/iframe-button/readme": { "created": "20170605134134227", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "A button (<> ) that applies an iframe to the selected url
\nWidth and height default to 1024px and 600px respectively.
\nAssigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/iframe}}\n\n!!! Macro:\n
<$view tiddler=\"$:/plugins/tg/iframe-button/macro\" format=\"text\"/>
\n\n!!! Usage:\n```\n<>\n```\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/iframe-button/readme", "modified": "20230827151019601", "modifier": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/iframe-button/license": { "created": "20210103210219139", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "[[Iframe button|http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html]] © Ton Gerner — 2018-2023\n\nMIT License: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/iframe-button/license", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221229112806814" }, "$:/plugins/tg/iframe-button/macro": { "created": "20221229112540088", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "\\define ifr(name w:\"1024\" h:\"600\")\n\n\\end", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/iframe-button/macro", "modified": "20221229112833004", "modifier": "TonGerner", "code-body": "yes" } } }
author: TonGerner
creator: TonGerner
name: Iframe button
